title: Bucketheads: A Star Wars Story
overview: A fan series, created by Transmute Pictures, two filmmakers out of Vancouver, B.C. who share a passion for Star Wars. In 2018 they created Bucketheads, an award-winning Star Wars Fan Film. This is a continuation of that story, a whole Bucketheads series that follows Nova Squad during the final days of the Empire leading up to the battle of Jakku. The series will feature five 20-30 minute episodes chronicling their original story as it unfolds during one of the most interesting backdrops in all of Star Wars.
